text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AC$ is $11$.
The length of the line $DB$ is $8$.
The length of the line $BH$ is $10$.
The line $BH$ is perpendicular to the line $CA$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $BH$, $CB$, and $DB$, forming the trapezoid $ABCD$.
The line $CH$ is a height of the trapezoid $ABCD$.
